name: ZX-25R
description: The Kawasaki ZX-25R is a sportbike that features a 250cc inline-four engine, which is a unique offering in the quarter-liter segment. It is designed for riders who seek high-revving performance and a thrilling riding experience. The bike is equipped with advanced technology, including ride-by-wire throttle, multiple riding modes, and a quick shifter for seamless gear changes. Its aggressive styling and aerodynamic design make it stand out on the road, while its lightweight chassis ensures nimble handling and agility.

view.details:
Plus :
 Mahal 
 Keren
 Enak dipakai harian

 Minus :
 Mahal
 Susah dicari sparepartnya

 Overall :
 Motor ini sangat cocok untuk kamu yang suka kecepatan dan performa tinggi. Namun, harga yang mahal dan sulitnya mencari sparepart bisa menjadi kendala bagi sebagian orang.
